original_text: That is true. God broke them off because they did not believe in Christ. God has accepted you as part of the tree because you do believe in Christ. So do not become proud. Instead, be afraid. That is true. God broke them off because they did not believe in Christ. God has accepted you as part of the tree because you do believe in Christ. So do not become proud. Instead, be afraid.
korean_text: 옳도다 그들은 믿지 아니하므로 꺾이고 너는 믿으므로 섰느니라 높은 마음을 품지 말고 도리어 두려워하라

sentences.original_text: because they did not believe in Christ.
sentences.korean_translation: 왜냐하면 그들이 그리스도를 믿지 않았기 때문입니다.

sentences.original_text: because you do believe in Christ.
